name: Create a new incident successfully
description: Verify agent can create an incident with all required fields using the Incident Management MCP server

input.prompt: Create a new incident with the name 'Server Outage', category 'Infrastructure', priority 'critical', state 'raised', ackState 'unacknowledged', occurrence time '2024-01-15T08:00:00Z', domain 'production', and source object ID 'server-001'. Return the created incident details including the incident ID.
